definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: Some of the advertising market unilateral sensationalism , but it is small.
sentences.chinese: 有些樓盤的廣告片面追求轟動效應，虛多實少。

sentences.english: The goal is exponential growth in a short period of time.
sentences.chinese: 這種策略的目的是在極短的時間內造成轟動效應。

sentences.english: A new hit drama will be stagged next week.
sentences.chinese: 一部新的具轟動效應的話劇將於下星期上演。
